### AmphibiCast (Episode&nbsp;198) <span class="media-tag tag-podcast">Podcast</span><span class="media-tag tag-university">University of Galway</span>  
<span class="media-date">21 March 2025</span>

In this episode I was interviewed about my recent work on how social‑media posts influence public perception of species extinctions—especially the surprising differences in engagement between amphibians and mammals.

**AmphibiCast** is an original amphibian‑focused podcast that explores science, conservation, and husbandry each week.

[Listen on Apple Podcasts →](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/amphibicast/id1525104326)
